name: As a user I could create post comment for existing user post only using valid data -- @1.1

steps.name: Given I have https://gorest.co.in/public/v2/comments to create post comment for 18695 with Asha Asan asan_asha@beahan.test and new comment
When I send the user post comment request with header details application/json application/json and valid token
Then I should have expected 201 response code for user post comment request

fullName: API SDET test: As a user I could create post comment for existing user post only using valid data
